name: E.G.G.S eternal green garden stealer
description:
W A S D - movement (along walls).

Mouse - aiming and shooting.

Your task is to clear 9 rooms and steal an egg from each one before the enemy gets reinforcements. If the time runs out, the egg will be saved and you will have to extra fight.

Made fo speedJam, so your task is to complete the game in the shortest time

Remember that the race for any number of eggs has its own characteristics. All 10 variations are unique and important.
